document.full_text: an alliance of southeastern public interest groups on wednesday asked the nuclear regulatory commission to suspend the fast-track approval process for the new westinghouse ap1000 reactor.
document.title: environmental groups seek delay in new u.s. nuclear plants
lines_and_colors: an alliance of southeastern public interest groups on wednesday asked the nuclear regulatory commission to suspend the fast-track approval process for the new westinghouse ap1000 reactor.
